mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTACH_FILE(GLOBAL_CODE, ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME, STORED_FILE_NAME, EXTENSION, CONTENT_TYPE, FILE_SIZE) VALUES(#{globalCode}, #{originalFileName}, #{storedFileName}, #{extension}, #{contentType}, #{fileSize})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ATTACH_FILE WHERE GLOBAL_CODE = #{globalCode} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE ATTACH_FILE SET DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE GLOBAL_CODE = #{globalCode}
